summaryProjects.txt.content:
MY PROJECTS

1. D-Cosmo - AI Medical Chatbot
   Advanced AI chatbot for medical field.
   Tech: AI/ML, Python, React

2. Portfolio - Terminal Styled

README.md.content:
D-COSMO - AI MEDICAL CHATBOT

Advanced AI-powered chatbot for medical assistance.

Features:
- Natural Language Processing
- Medical knowledge base
- Multi-language support

Tech: Python, React, TensorFlow, FastAPI
Status: Active Development

PORTFOLIO - TERMINAL STYLED

Terminal-styled portfolio showcasing work and skills.

Features:
- Full terminal interface
- File system navigation
- Interactive commands

Tech: React 19, TypeScript, Xterm.js, Tailwind
Status: Production Ready
